snippet.title: Plasmania longplay with cheats (Apple II - Sirius software)
snippet.description:
To celebrate my channel exceeding 1K views, I created this video about one of my favorite Apple ][ action games. Plasmania (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/plasmania) was an action game published by Sirius software in 1983 for the Apple ][. The player controls a nano spaceship inside a patient's body and needs to destroy the virus before the it destroys the patient. I always wonder whether this game has an ending, so I played the game with cheats, only to find out it keeps repeating itself. I eventually turned off the cheats after saving 10 patients.

Hope you enjoy the longplay!

PS: The hit point is saved in memory address 0x0090. To stop the game from deducting the hit point, search for "A5 90 38 E5 84 85 90" and change "85 90" to "EA EA".
